mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.ordernum AS "ordernum", a.materialcode AS "materialcode", a.materialname AS "materialname", a.quantitiy AS "quantitiy", a.size AS "size", a.reason AS "reason", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.ingredient AS "ingredient", a.unit AS "unit", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.name AS "parent.name", o9.name AS "office.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_requisition_detail( id, parent_id, ordernum, materialcode, materialname, quantitiy, size, reason, office_id, ingredient, unit, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{ordernum}, #{materialcode}, #{materialname}, #{quantitiy}, #{size}, #{reason}, #{office.id}, #{ingredient}, #{unit}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE account_requisition_detail SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, ordernum = #{ordernum}, materialcode = #{materialcode}, materialname = #{materialname}, quantitiy = #{quantitiy}, size = #{size}, reason = #{reason}, office_id = #{office.id}, ingredient = #{ingredient}, unit = #{unit}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
